room_title: Escape room "The Manor" by Hellscream Room Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: There were 8 of us friends for an adult night out and wanted to try something different. Did Hel's Manor and it was a blast. Fun to see how we all worked together (or didn't work together). :) cannot wait to go again.

room_title: Escape room "The Manor" by Hellscream Room Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: This was so much fun. We laughed the whole time - I went with my mom and it was such a great time for us! The owner was super awesome and made the experience for us! Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "The Manor" by Hellscream Room Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: This was really so much fun! I can't wait to do the other room!!
